title: Electric cars produce less brake dust pollution than combustion-engine cars
author: tzs
aiHeadline: Electric cars: Because who doesn't want to save the planet while looking down on everyone else in their silent, emissions-free ride?

title: Itch.io: Update on NSFW Content
author: panic
aiHeadline: Itch.io finally decides to update their NSFW policy, because what's the point of having rules if you don't change them every few months?

title: There is no memory safety without thread safety
author: tavianator
aiHeadline: Why memory safety is like a picky roommate: because if you don't clean up your threads, it'll throw a hissy fit and crash your program.

title: Starlink is currently experiencing a service outage
author: throwmeaway222
aiHeadline: Starlink outage: Because what's a few hours of no internet when you're paying for the future of connectivity? At least your neighbors are just as annoyed as you are.

title: Two narratives about AI
author: RickJWagner
aiHeadline: AI: The ultimate Rorschach test where everyone sees what they want, because who needs facts when you've got opinions?
